Uses of SelectionDecorator in org.magelan.drawing.markup
 

Classes in org.magelan.drawing.markup that implement SelectionDecorator
 class DefaultSelectionDecorator
          Decorates selected elements by painting their outline with a different stroke.
 class HighlightDecorator
          Decorates selected elements by repainting their outline with a stroke 2 units thick and applying transparent fill to their interior.
